divs: Sighting Detailswe were indpendece and just came out of the store and debbie said what that i looked up and we saw 5 orbs 3 of them were in a strait line like the lights over arzonia the other two just set there and one of them made a pefect s monver and circled one the lights and went back i was so in amzed that i was having trouble with my phone i was going to take a pick of the lights and then they just blinked out i am a former ctt and am very fimalar with aircraft and had a ts sci clearnce and have never seen any aircraft (man made) make these manovers they were not airplans they had no red or blinking lights on them they were constant like a flar i have always been a bliver in life out there and i'm so stoked that i got to see this event and this is where the wierd part begans our gps system was off and in the consule with the battery dead and it began to give us directions and the toys we got for son began to make nosie without being turned on and the radio went silent the only thing that didnt happen was truck didnt die this is the wriedist experice i have ever had and debbie saw it all i just wander has any one in the northern ky area seen this at about 8pm
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around November 7th 2009
